name: MechRunner
blurb: An endless arcade action game that casts you as a powerful mech in stunning cinematic battles against a relentless robotic army.

rewards.reward: DESKTOP WALLPAPERS\r\n==============================\r\nA set of 4 awesome desktop wallpapers featuring the XP-41!

GAME ON!\r\n==============================\r\nGet a PC/Mac (via Steam) OR Playstation 4/ Playstation Vita copy of the game. (The Steam version includes early access to the game!) Also included are the set of desktop wallpapers PLUS your choice of 4 mech upgrades as a special 'thank you' from the development team!
ROCK & ROLL\r\n============================== \r\nWallpapers, The Game, 4 mech upgrades, Soundtrack, Name in the Game Credits
